
Silliman's Fossil Mount, Frobisher Bay, Baffin Land, Canada.
 Collected by S. K. Roy, Rawson-MacMillan Expedition, 1927-
 1928.
 Remarks: Hormotoma = Murchisonia (Hormotoma)
 Knightetal.,1960p. 1291

Thein and Nitecki, 1974, pp. 191-192, fig. 86a-b
 Upper Mississippian, Chester Series, Golconda Limestone.
 Cement Quarry northwest of Golconda, sec. 24, T. 13S., R. 6E., Gol-
 conda Quadrangle, Illinois. Collected by H. N. Toler.
